description: The attacker tried to shoot Jewish worshippers - then killed two people outside a synagogue in Halle.
title: Halle synagogue attack: Germany far-right gunman jailed for life
title_page: Halle synagogue attack: Germany far-right gunman jailed for life - BBC News
maintext: Psychiatrist Norbert Leygraf said of Balliet, in an evaluation, that he had symptoms of schizophrenia, paranoia and autism preventing him from having "empathy with others" while feeling "superior to others", AFP news agency reported.
